hero.title: The Ultimate Intelligence Layer for Gemini CLI
hero.subtitle: Unlock the full power of Gemini v0.27 Nightly with autonomous browsing, multi-agent orchestration, and advanced lifecycle hooks.

agents.title: Autonomous Agents
agents.desc: Native multi-agent orchestration with codebase_investigator and specialized specialist agents.

hooks.title: Protocol Hooks
hooks.desc: Strict Elite Core protocols with automated type-checking, commit validation, and session triggers.

conductor.title: Conductor Protocol
conductor.desc: Structured track management and execution plans for complex software projects.

browser.title: Web Automation
browser.desc: Integrated browser-use MCP for autonomous web navigation, data extraction, and online tasks.

community.title: The Future of AI Engineering
community.text: Gemini Elite Core is an open-source movement to redefine how developers interact with AI in the terminal. Join us in building the next frontier.
